Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.objectives

Class DiagonalPattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.objectives.PatternFinder
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.objectives.DiagonalPattern
public class DiagonalPattern extends PatternFinder
Find the occurrences of the diagonal pattern on the playing board. The pattern is composed by three cards of the same kingdom, placed along the diagonal direction.
